content.raw_text: From: Pocket Team <noreply@getpocket.com> To: Petra Ivanković <petra.ivankovic93@gmail.com> Date: September 22, 2023 Subject: Your Pocket Premium payment receipt Reply-To: support@getpocket.com Hi Petra, Thank you for subscribing to Pocket Premium. This email confirms that your payment has been successfully processed, and your Premium subscription is now active. You’ve chosen the Annual Plan, which offers a permanent library of everything you save, advanced search across your entire list, suggested tags, and an ad-free experience across all platforms. Your subscription will renew automatically unless canceled before the renewal date. Payment Details: • Plan: Pocket Premium (Annual) • Amount Charged: $44.99 USD • Date Charged: September 22, 2023 • Payment Method: Visa ending in 5027 • Invoice ID: #PCKT-87344128 You can manage your subscription, update your billing information, or view invoices by visiting your account settings. If you have any questions, our support team is available to help. You can reach us anytime at support@getpocket.com. Thanks again for supporting a better reading experience. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms • Privacy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

From: Pocket Billing <billing@getpocket.com> To: Emilie Thomassen <emilie.thomassen@protonmail.com> Date: November 18, 2023 Subject: Your Pocket Premium invoice Reply-To: support@getpocket.com Hi Emilie, Thank you for subscribing to Pocket Premium. This email is to confirm that your invoice has been generated for your recent subscription payment. You’ve now unlocked a range of features designed to enhance your reading experience across devices, including permanent library access, full-text search, suggested tagging, and an ad-free interface. The following invoice includes the full details of your subscription plan and associated billing information. You were charged upon confirmation of the annual plan. This charge will automatically renew each year unless canceled beforehand. Invoice Summary • Invoice ID: #PCKT-11498274 • Plan: Pocket Premium – Annual • Billing Date: November 18, 2023 • Amount Charged: $44.99 USD • Payment Method: Mastercard ending in 7614 You can view or download your invoice anytime by accessing your Pocket account settings. If you’d like to update your billing method or change your subscription preferences, those options are available through the same dashboard. Renewal occurs automatically at the end of each billing cycle unless you cancel beforehand. Should you have any questions about your billing, feel free to reach out to us directly at support@getpocket.com. We’re here to help. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms of Service • Privacy Policy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

From: Pocket Billing <billing@getpocket.com> To: Carlos Fernández <carlos.fernandez78@mail.com> Date: September 14, 2023 Subject: We couldn’t process your Pocket Premium payment Reply‑To: support@getpocket.com Hi Carlos, We’re sorry, but there was an issue processing your recent Pocket Premium renewal. We tried to charge your card on file but couldn’t complete the payment, and your subscription remains active—for now—but your billing information may need updating. Payment Attempt Details: • Plan: Pocket Premium – Monthly • Attempt Date: September 14, 2023 • Amount: $4.99 USD • Card on File: Visa ending in 3456 • Invoice ID: #PCKT-24561309 It’s possible your card has expired, reached its limit, or your bank declined the transaction. To avoid any interruption to your features—like full‑text search, suggested tags, highlights, and the permanent library—please visit your Pocket account settings and update your payment information as soon as possible. If your billing info is already correct, your bank may have declined it—sometimes due to international charges or temporary holds. We recommend contacting your bank for more details. Once the issue is resolved, we’ll attempt the renewal again in 24 hours. If you believe this message reached you in error, or if you need help updating your information, please reach out to us at support@getpocket.com. We’re here to help and ensure your experience remains seamless. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms of Service • Privacy Policy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

From: Pocket Billing <billing@getpocket.com> To: Anika Kuznetsova <anika.kuznetsova82@mail.com> Date: December 5, 2023 Subject: Your refund has been processed Reply-To: support@getpocket.com Hi Anika, We’re sorry to see you go, but we’ve processed a refund for your recent Pocket Premium subscription. The unused balance has been returned to your original payment method, and your account now reflects the updated subscription status. Refund Summary • Plan Refunded: Pocket Premium – Annual • Original Billing Date: September 22, 2023 • Refund Date: December 5, 2023 • Refund Amount: $22.50 USD (prorated) • Payment Method: Visa ending in 4291 • Original Invoice ID: #PCKT-11053267 Please note it may take 5–10 business days for the refund to appear on your statement, depending on your bank or card issuer. Your subscription has been canceled, and you still have access to Premium features through your current billing cycle. If you have any questions or believe there’s been an error, feel free to reach out to us at support@getpocket.com. We’re here to help. Thank you for using Pocket and supporting mindful reading. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms • Privacy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

From: Pocket Billing <billing@getpocket.com> To: Søren Vestergaard <soren.vestergaard76@mail.com> Date: October 20, 2023 Subject: Your Pocket Premium subscription has renewed Reply‑To: support@getpocket.com Hi Søren, Thank you for staying with us. Your Pocket Premium subscription has successfully renewed, and you now continue to enjoy uninterrupted access to all premium features—including unlimited permanent library storage, full-text search, suggested tags, highlights, and an ad-free reading experience across all your devices—for another term. Renewal Details • Plan: Pocket Premium – Annual • Renewal Date: October 20, 2023 • Amount Charged: $44.99 USD • Payment Method: Mastercard ending in 3287 • Invoice ID: #PCKT-13245789 You can view or download the invoice by logging into your Pocket account settings. Your subscription is set to automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless canceled before the renewal date—so feel free to manage or cancel at any time. If you ever need assistance or want to explore our latest feature updates, our support team is ready to help. Just reply to this email or visit the Pocket Help Center. Thank you for continuing to support thoughtful reading. We’re glad to keep bringing you on-board. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms of Service • Privacy Policy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105

From: Pocket Billing <billing@getpocket.com> To: Lucia Méndez <lucia.mendez91@mail.com> Date: December 2, 2023 Subject: We couldn’t process your Pocket Premium payment Reply‑To: support@getpocket.com Hi Lucia, We’re sorry, but we couldn’t process your recent Pocket Premium renewal. Your card on file was declined, and while your subscription remains active today, your Premium features may be interrupted if payment isn’t updated soon. Payment Attempt Details: • Plan: Pocket Premium – Monthly • Attempt Date: December 2, 2023 • Amount: $4.99 USD • Card on File: Mastercard ending in 6423 • Invoice ID: #PCKT-18928452 Sometimes payments fail because cards expire, hit limits, or banks block transactions. Don’t worry—we’ll try again automatically within 24 hours. To ensure seamless access to your permanent library, highlights, full‑text search, suggested tags, and an ad‑free experience, please update your payment information by logging into your Pocket account settings. If you believe your current card should work or if this message feels unexpected, you can also contact your bank—they may have flagged the charge. If you run into any problems updating your details, just reply to this email or visit our Help Center and we’ll assist you personally. You won’t lose access immediately, but we recommend updating your payment soon to keep everything running smoothly. We appreciate you being part of Pocket and look forward to continuing to support your reading journey. — The Pocket Team Pocket Support • Terms of Service • Privacy Policy © 2023 Mozilla Corporation, 2 Harrison Street, San Francisco, CA 94105
